name: Alobaidi Timeline
author: Alobaidi

sections.description:
Alobaidi Timeline

Make timeline page in 1 minute! Just one shortcode, pagination support with text translation, custom list type, easy to use.

The Features

  1. Make timeline page in 1 minute.
  2. One shortcode only.
  3. Custom list type.
  4. Pagination support.
  5. Text translation.
  6. Easy to use.

Live Demo

  • http://wp-plugins.in/Alobaidi_Timeline

Rate The Plugin

  • Please rate Alobaidi Timeline plugin

More Plugins

  • My Plugins
sections.installation:
Installation

  1. Upload ‘alobaidi-timeline’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

Usage

Use this shortcode in post or page: [alobaidi_timeline]

Shortcode Attributes

Alobaidi timeline has 4 attributes:

number="here enter number of posts per page" default is "100". list="here enter list type, for example: ol" default is "ul". prev="here enter text translate" default is "Previous Page". next="here enter text translate" default is "Next Page".

For example (Spanish translation):

[alobaidi_timeline number=”50″ list=”ol” prev=”Pagina anterior” next=”Pagina siguiente”]

Read explanation of use
sections.faq:

  • Read explanation of use
  • For more questions or help, contact me.
  • Or on twitter.
